articles.title: Frequency-adjusted daratumumab-based regimen versus bortezomib/dexamethasone in newly diagnosed AL amyloidosis: a matched-cohort study.
articles.summary: A personalized daratumumab treatment approach showed promising results for patients with newly diagnosed light-chain amyloidosis, potentially offering an alternative to standard bortezomib therapy.

articles.title: Endobronchial ultrasound-guided mediastinal biopsies for the diagnosis of mediastinal diseases: A network meta-analysis.
articles.summary: A network meta-analysis shows endobronchial ultrasound-guided biopsies effectively diagnose mediastinal diseases, particularly in lung cancer staging.
